wikipedia_page.main:
Ben Kaye (born 19 December 1988) is an English rugby league footballer who plays as a hooker for Batley Bulldogs in the Betfred Championship.
He played for the Leeds Rhinos and Harlequins RL in the Super League, and for Featherstone Rovers and Halifax in the Championship.
